TopicTitle: So Danny2462 is Irish? [link to FB Page] He's actually Hungarian

Articles.Content:

I have found evidence Danny is Irish. I'm just unsure if this is the real Danny AI or just a wannabe fake.

So since the Forums are not friendly enough for Mobile Posters, I'll link a Facebook Page I made instead because I don't know how to post pictures when on mobile sadly ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-12T00:27:21Z" title="05/12/2015 12:27  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 12, 2015</time> by IMaKIDfromPH**
  
lol forgot link

A) Who could have ever guessed, with the name "Danny"

![B)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_cool.png) Who cares?

> 
> no i think he's hungarian.

Yup, i also think he is hungarian, as his YouTube-channel is based there.

But what I have learned from playing KSP is, that borders are only a thing if you live on the surface ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

So yeah... who cares...

One of us! One of us! One of us!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-12T00:31:29Z" title="05/12/2015 12:31  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 12, 2015</time> by MalfunctionM1Ke**
Probably so... I guess the other is truly fake.
I'm still going with the theory that Scott Manley is actually Danny.

> 
> I'm still going with the theory that Scott Manley is actually Danny.

Mind = blown

> 
> So since the Forums are not friendly enough for Mobile Posters, I'll link a Facebook Page I made instead because I don't know how to post pictures when on mobile sadly ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Creating an entire Facebook page just to host a single screenshot from a mobile device is a bit heavy-handed.

In the future consider:

 - Posting from an actual computer rather than a mobile device, as the vBulletin software used for the KSP forums aren't optimized for mobile users

 - Upload your screenshots to a image hosting website like Imgur, and then embed the Imgur photo in your forums posts
